ygData.subject: Re: Linear game play
ygData.msgSnippet: I read the post but didn t notice that part. Maybe I just blocked it out. That is a reprehensable thing to say. What if someone who reads this list is a friend
ygData.messageBody:
I read the post but didn't notice that part. Maybe I just blocked it
out. That is a reprehensable thing to say. What if someone who reads
this list is a friend or family member. Very unlikely but possible.
There is nothing remotely funny or cool about that. Its just in very
very bad taste.
